dcterms:description: The training and validation data consists of 7000 and 1000 samples, respectively, with 330 samples in the informative class and 3374 samples in the uninformative class.

dcterms:description: The test dataset consists of 12000 tweets, with 2000 tweets labeled as informative and 10000 labeled as uninformative.
